scripts.build:css: npm run build:site.css && npm run build:panel.css
scripts.build:site.js: node ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js static/scripts/site/main.js static/scripts/site/build/main-bundle.js && node ./node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js static/scripts/site/build/main-bundle.js --out-file static/scripts/site/build/main-transpiled.js && node ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js static/scripts/site/build/main-transpiled.js static/scripts/site/main.min.js -p
scripts.build:panel.js: node ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js static/scripts/panel/main.js static/scripts/panel/build/main-bundle.js && node ./node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js static/scripts/panel/build/main-bundle.js --out-file static/scripts/panel/build/main-transpiled.js && node ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js static/scripts/panel/build/main-transpiled.js static/scripts/panel/main.min.js -p
scripts.build:js: npm run build:site.js && npm run build:panel.js
